metadata.description: This is a piece of labgrown opal. I fine-tuned a process that allows me to grow full spectrum opals in as little as 5 days. This video documents the interaction of photons/ white light entering the cubic lattice of silica nanoparticles and being broken apart into its respective colors. This video is a time capsule of how the creative process can collaborate with light physics and chemistry.
metadata.title: Diffracted Light
metadata.subtitle: Lab grown opal diffracting light
metadata.name: Opal1
